devdoc.details: This contract handles multiple swaps simultaneously. Each swap is identified by a unique swapId. Funds are locked when users initiate swaps, and unlocked when secrets are revealed.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

returns._0: canCancel True if timelock expired and swap is still open

completeSwap(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: Only the maker (original initiator on Ethereum) can claim to prevent front-running

returns._0: isValid True if secret matches secretHash

receiveSwap(bytes32,bytes32,address,uint.details: Called by the XCM bridge contract for backward compatibilityOther parameters are present for compatibility but not used

devdoc.title: DotFusion Polkadot Escrow (Destination)

canCancel(bytes32).notice: Check if swap can be cancelled

cancelSwap(bytes32).notice: Cancel a swap after timelock expires

completeSwap(bytes32,bytes32,address).notice: Complete a swap by revealing the secret

createNativeSwap(bytes32,bytes32,address.notice: Create a new swap with native DOT

createSwap(bytes32,bytes32,address,addre.notice: Create a new swap with ERC20 tokens

isValidSecret(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Check if secret is valid for a swap

publicCancelSwap(bytes32).notice: Public cancellation function (for access token holders)

receiveSwap(bytes32,bytes32,address,uint.notice: Receive a cross-chain swap message from Ethereum (XCM Bridge compatibility)

rescueFunds(bytes32).notice: Rescue funds from a swap after rescue delay

userdoc.notice: Destination escrow contract for cross-chain atomic swaps on Polkadot
